DataSourceContainer.Name: Quest 2
DataSourceContainer.text: :0e1f81bbcf2dd8ec:Um, Can I Have A Wussy One Instead?

Page.Name: QuestDetails
Page.Text: :0e1f81bbcf2dd8ec_1:Um, Can I Have A Wussy One Instead?

:0e1f81bb9c48c4ef:[DEVL]I completed the seemingly impossible tasks given to me by High Chieftain Brass. I overcame all odds, persevered where all others failed. My success shone through the darkest fog of doubt. I am a beacon of virtue, a pillar of solidarity and may all others crumble with insecurity within my wake. I am a rock. I am an island. I am an army of one. Fear me.

Checkbox.Name: AutoAdd
Checkbox.Tooltip: :a2c3b63f614a9395:Display the collection window when a new collection item is looted.

Page.Name: TitlePage
Page.Text: :a2c3b63f78f8d078:[DEVL]Take 10,000 or more points of damage from falling.

Page.Name: TitleDecoration
Page.Text: Complete any 2 of the following Objectives

Page.Name: HeaderPage
Page.Text: :a2c3b63fb86fdf09:Here is room for an explanation of the objective category and whatever else the designers what to put here.

Page.Name: Reward
Page.Text: :a2c3b63f5af37426:[DEVL] Item With a Very Very Very Very Very Very Long Name
